subject: Hurricane Katrina
Football
lead_paragraph: Newly opened in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, South Plaquemines High won for the first time ever last Friday, but the team lost a major-college prospect in the process.
snippet: Newly opened in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, South Plaquemines High won for the first time ever last Friday, but the team lost a major-college prospect in the process.
